name: Chronical
description:
The power of time is at your fingertips! Take control of a powerful Chronomancer in this mysterious puzzle-platformer. Explore the Chronical school to discover its secrets and learn new spells. Will you save all of the professors and reveal the mystery of the Time Loop?

Features:

  • Innovative puzzles and mechanics
  • 4 magic spells to master
  • 2-3 hours of gameplay
  • Fascinating mysteries!

Chronical is a single-player puzzle-platforming game. This is a PC game with gamepad controls only. The game contains 2-3 hours of gameplay with fresh new mechanics and puzzles you haven’t seen before. The game was created by the class of 2022-2023 of Campus ADN, a school of videogame development in Montréal, Québec.
